distri: Pop songs are well represented in the data set. Looking at the hotness of pop music we can see that it does not seem to resist well to the time fashion's laws. Indeed, for songs older than 5 years(before 2010), the hotness is below the average value.
Hottness: Looking at the instrumentalness we can observe that pop music has a lower presence of instruments in its songs and thus it also means that pop music is more about voice than just instruments. On this point electronic and pop music are in complete opposition. The other characteristics of pop music represent well the average behavior.
